title: [CLIENT] Shen true damage/true damage dealt in post game graph is at -2,000,000,000
body:
In a blind pick Twisted Treeline game where my team consisted of Tryndamere Olaf and Swain and their team consisted of Vayne Shen and Brand, Shen's damage dealt seems to be bugged in the post game analysis.  I don't have steps to reproduce the problem, and I haven't tried to reproduce it myself, although it may have to do with how Shen's Spirit Refuge interacts with true damage.

Keep up the good work, Riot {{champion:91}}

replies.body:
Looks like someone cast to a signed integer by mistake c _ c

Here, we have 15,000 (a good estimate of damage output) in binary: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 1010 1001 1000
Here, we have -2147468648 : **1**000 0000 0000 0000 0011 1010 1001 1000

As there is no logical reason for damage to ever be negative, it looks like riot is just being slowly infected with java programmers.
